plugins.name: Quick Fill and Hug
plugins.description:
Streamlines layout adjustments by allowing designers to quickly modify the sizing behavior of selected elements.


With simple commands, users can toggle between "Fill Container" and "Hug Contents" for both horizontal and vertical directions. This functionality saves time when working with responsive layouts, ensuring consistent spacing and alignment across designs.
plugins.tagline: Essential keyboard shortcut to fill and hug horizontal/vertically

100803.name: Quick Fill and Hug

100803.tagline: Essential keyboard shortcut to fill and hug horizontal/vertically

plugins.description: SaaStack is a Figma plugin built to supercharge your SaaS product design workflow. Instantly browse, preview, and drag high-quality, customizable UI components like navbars, cards, charts, and tables—ready to drop into your design file. Whether you’re prototyping dashboards or refining app interfaces, SaaStack helps you design faster and smarter with consistent, production-grade elements.

plugins.name: GIFtastic
plugins.description:
🎬 GIFtastic - Turn Your Figma Frames Into Animated GIFs

Transform your Figma designs into captivating animated GIFs with just a few clicks! Perfect for showcasing UI interactions, creating marketing assets, or sharing design concepts.


✨ Key Features

  1. Smart & Simple
  2. Select frames and preview your animation in real-time
  3. Drag & drop to reorder frames
  4. One-click export with automatic downloads


Professional Quality

  1. 4 quality levels (64-256 colours)
  2. Multiple background options (transparent, white, black, or frame fill)
  3. Advanced dithering for smooth gradients
  4. Real-time file size preview


Complete Control

  1. Adjustable frame timing (0.05-5 seconds)
  2. Loop settings and playback controls
  3. Live preview with play/pause
  4. Memory-efficient processing


🚀 Perfect For

  1. UI/UX Designers: Showcase app interactions and user flows
  2. Marketing Teams: Create engaging social media content
  3. Product Teams: Demonstrate features and functionality
  4. Anyone: Who wants to make their designs move!


🎯 How It Works

  1. Select your frames in Figma
  2. Preview your animation with real-time playback
  3. Adjust quality, timing, and background settings
  4. Reorder frames by dragging if needed
  5. Export and download your GIF instantly


Ready to bring your designs to life? Install GIFtastic and start creating engaging animated stories from your Figma frames!
plugins.tagline: Transform your Figma designs into captivating animated GIFs with just a few clicks!

plugins.name: 단순노무
plugins.description:
사용방법: https://youtu.be/gdHHHRS4cxk


선택한 프레임을 기반으로 여러 프레임을 빠르게 복제하고, 표 형식 데이터를 사용하여 각 프레임의 이름과 내부 텍스트 레이어 내용을 자동으로 채워주는 플러그인입니다. 스프레드시트나 마크다운 테이블 데이터를 붙여넣어 한 번에 입력하고, 복제된 프레임을 원하는 개수만큼 가로로 정렬하여 그리드 형태로 배치할 수 있습니다. 반복적인 콘텐츠 생성 및 관리 작업을 효율적으로 처리하세요.
plugins.tagline: 복붙은 이제그만~ 한 번에 하세요

plugins.name: Private Comments – Personal Notes in Figma
plugins.description:
The first-of-its-kind plugin that lets you add private comments to any frame or layer in your file.


Whether you're jotting reminders, tracking feedback, or planning edits — Private Comments help you stay organized without cluttering your file or notifying your team.


🗂️ Attach comments to specific frames / layers

✅ Mark as done / not done

🧠 Keep thoughts to yourself — No public comments or notifications

🔍 Edit, or delete comments anytime

📦 All comments are saved in your file


Perfect for noting feedback, internal critiques, or just managing your mental checklist or ideas directly inside Figma.

accepted.name: Manas Manohar
accepted.description:
Fintech | Product Designer

I love the process of creation. The process of building something new...

plugins.tagline: Add private, personal notes to frames and layers – just for you.

plugins.name: Fig Toolkit
plugins.description:
Fig Toolkit is your all-in-one Figma companion, focused on helping designers sort, align, and organise their workspace faster and more intuitively. With powerful sorting tools, renaming capabilities, and precise alignment options, you can bring structure and clarity to any design layout. For those managing text consistency, the toolkit also scans and identifies unstyled or mixed text layers, making it easy to apply or update text styles.


🔹 Easily sort and rename layers

🔹 Precisely align elements with adjustable spacing

🔹 Wrap layers into new sections with custom padding

🔹 Reorder layers directly in the layers panel

🔹 Detect mixed or unstyled fonts

🔹 View and fix text layers missing styles

🔹 Apply or update text styles quickly

🔹 Streamline your design workflow with ease
plugins.tagline: Sort, Align & Manage Styles in Figma Effortlessly

plugins.name: Frame Toggler
plugins.description: Problem : When presenting a solution, explaining the main workflow while showcasing multiple design options for each page can clutter the view. Solution : Use this tool to collapse alternative pages in the main workflow, displaying only the first option initially. After presenting the main flow, click a toggle button to expand all pages for detailed discussions
plugins.tagline: Toggle Frame show/hide

After presenting the main flow, click a toggle button to expand all pages for detailed discussions

plugins.name: Color Extractor
plugins.description: A Figma plugin that quickly detects the dominant color of the selected image layer and automatically adds it as a new fill to the layer. Perfect for designers who need to extract and use the main color in their layouts, palettes, or backgrounds.
plugins.tagline: Detect and add the dominant color of an image to your layer fills with one click.

120795.name: Color Extractor
120795.description: A Figma plugin that quickly detects the dominant color of the selected image layer and automatically adds it as a new fill to the layer. Perfect for designers who need to extract and use the main color in their layouts, palettes, or backgrounds.

networkAccess.reasoning: The plugin requires access to Figma's CDN to retrieve and process images used in the selected layers.

120795.tagline: Detect and add the dominant color of an image to your layer fills with one click.

plugins.name: Notes
plugins.description:
Notes is a Figma plugin designed to streamline collaboration between designers, project managers, and engineers. It enhances the design handoff process by providing a structured way to document and share feedback directly within Figma. Whether you're annotating designs, adding development notes, or organizing project details, Notes ensures seamless communication and clarity across teams.

With Notes, design handoff becomes more efficient, reducing miscommunication and making it easier for teams to align on project goals.

accepted.name: TemiTope Aiyegbusi
accepted.description: designing for the next billion users.

plugins.tagline: Seamless Collaboration, Effortless Handoff

plugins.name: Stockpress
plugins.description:
About

Welcome to the Stockpress plugin for Figma, where you can quickly find and add files from your Stockpress workspace to your Figma designs. Once ready, export Frames and images back to Stockpress - complete with Frame URLs for easy access to working files!


What is Stockpress?

Stockpress is a refreshingly simple Digital Asset Management system–for everyone. One centralized workspace to add, organize, collaborate on, and share files with unlimited users and teams.


How to get started:

  1. First, sign up for a Stockpress workspace (get started for free!)
  2. Upload or import your files and folders to get organized
  3. Install the Stockpress plugin for Figma and connect your account
  4. Easily add files from Stockpress to your Figma designs
  5. Export Frames, images, and/or Frame URLs back to Stockpress


For help, contact us through your in-workspace chat or email us at help@stockpress.co
plugins.tagline: Add files from your Stockpress workspace to your design and export Figma assets back once ready

121422.name: Stockpress
121422.description:
About

Welcome to the Stockpress plugin for Figma, where you can quickly find and add files from your Stockpress workspace to your Figma designs. Once ready, export Frames and images back to Stockpress - complete with Frame URLs for easy access to working files!


What is Stockpress?

Stockpress is a refreshingly simple Digital Asset Management system–for everyone. One centralized workspace to add, organize, collaborate on, and share files with unlimited users and teams.


How to get started:

  1. First, sign up for a Stockpress workspace (get started for free!)
  2. Upload or import your files and folders to get organized
  3. Install the Stockpress plugin for Figma and connect your account
  4. Easily add files from Stockpress to your Figma designs
  5. Export Frames, images, and/or Frame URLs back to Stockpress


For help, contact us through your in-workspace chat or email us at help@stockpress.co
121422.tagline: Add files from your Stockpress workspace to your design and export Figma assets back once ready

plugins.name: Update FigJam Colors
plugins.description:
A small utility plugin to automatically update your FigJam stickies, shapes, sections and connectors to the new colors released on Feb 4 2025.


Instructions

  2. run plugin via the Action Menu ( ⌘+P, CTRL + P)
  3. see new colors!


Feedback & Support

  2. github.com/akbarbmirza

plugins.name: Page Builder PRO
plugins.description:
PageBuilder PRO is your ultimate tool for streamlining project organization in Figma. With just a few clicks, you can automatically create a set of well-structured pages tailored to your design workflow.


Key Features:

•Customizable Pages: Predefined templates for common design tasks, including wireframes, design QA, prototypes, and more.

•Interactive UI: Select only the pages you need for each project.

•Effortless Setup: Save time and stay organized with auto-generated frames, titles, and descriptions.

•Built-In Guidelines: Each page comes with optional content to guide your design process.


Whether you’re working on a small prototype or a large-scale project, PageBuilder PRO helps you start on the right foot.

accepted.name: ASSIST Software
accepted.description:
Design work that converts. 
From idea to market 🚀
Design team @ ASSIST Software

plugins.tagline: Your Blueprint for Project Organization.

plugins.name: Hive
plugins.description:
Tired of endless swiping, cluttered frames, and struggling to stay focused?

Say hello to Hive, the ultimate Figma plugin designed to transform your design process. With its minimalist approach and powerful features, Hive ensures a smoother, more organized, and efficient workflow for designers and teams alike. Perfect for those working on complex projects with multiple screens and teams presenting designs or collaborating on organized workspaces.


Key Features

🗂 Create Categories: Group frames into organized categories for a streamlined workflow.

🔍 Zoom-In Functionality: Quickly focus on specific categories, making navigation seamless.

🎯 Smooth Screen Presentation: Eliminate the frustration of moving around messy frames while presenting. Hive ensures a clean, irritation-free presentation experience.

⚡ Simplified Workflow: Minimalist, easy-to-use interface that saves time and effort.

🔄 Quick Frame Switching: Easily switch between frames without excessive swiping, allowing for a faster and more efficient workflow as you move through different tasks.


Why This Plugin?

When working on large design files, scrolling endlessly, searching for frames, or jumping between screens during team presentations can be chaotic and jarring to the eye. Hive eliminates the frustration by organizing frames into clear categories and enabling zoom-in functionality. Whether you're working alone or presenting designs to your team, Hive keeps your workspace smooth, clean, and irritation-free.

🚀 Boost Productivity: Spend less time navigating and more time designing.

🗂️ Stay Organized: Keep your navigation intuitive without modifying your file structure.

🎯 Improve Focus: Streamline your workflow to maintain momentum on your creative projects.

🤝 Enhance Collaboration: Share organized and easy-to-navigate files with your team, fostering better teamwork and understanding.

⏳ Save Time: Glide’s intuitive features reduce the time spent on repetitive tasks, giving you more room for creativity.


Ready to Hive? Try it out now and watch your productivity soar. Let your designs flow effortlessly. Organize, focus, and present without distractions.
plugins.tagline: Hive: Organise. Categorise. Focus.

plugins.name: BableBox
plugins.description:
BableBox is a Figma plugin designed to make translating your interfaces a breeze. With a single click, it converts your entire design from one language to another, preserving context to ensure accurate, natural translations.


Say goodbye to the hassle of translating hundreds of words and phrases manually! BableBox leverages GPT-4o mini, one of the best AI models, which understands the context of each text to avoid errors (it intelligently skips icons and symbols like FontAwesome, for instance).


This plugin is perfect for designers and global teams looking for a fast, reliable, and easy solution to translate projects while maintaining content coherence and quality.


In short: a one-click translation tool built to save you time and reduce errors. 🌍🚀
plugins.tagline: BableBox: Translate your designs in one click, with perfect context 🌍

plugins.name: Fixiq — Fix the scale of working area
plugins.description:
Intro

In Figma, the current scale is not shown anywhere on the canvas. You can’t see how far you have moved from the actual scale of the frame. You can only select the frame and see its dimensions. And then estimate the ratio of pixels to percentages.


In Figma, you can zoom in to 100% once using hotkeys. But any movement on the board can lead to an accidental change in scale.


Solution

Fixiq not only fixes the 100% scale, but can also change it to 50%, 100%, 200%.


Plugin will be useful not only for designers, but also for managers. With Fixiq you can easily design interfaces of non-standard sizes/proportions and be sure about the scale you're working with. Your layouts will always be in the actual/original size. Managers can present project results to clients without irritating zooming.

accepted.name: Roman Nebel
accepted.description: IT Manager / UX Expert / Pet-projects Developer

plugins.tagline: Figma plugin that fixes the scale of working area

119907.name: Fixiq — Fix the scale of working area
119907.description:
Intro

In Figma, the current scale is not shown anywhere on the canvas. You can’t see how far you have moved from the actual scale of the frame. You can only select the frame and see its dimensions. And then estimate the ratio of pixels to percentages.


In Figma, you can zoom in to 100% once using hotkeys. But any movement on the board can lead to an accidental change in scale.


Solution

Fixiq not only fixes the 100% scale, but can also change it to 50%, 100%, 200%.


Plugin will be useful not only for designers, but also for managers. With Fixiq you can easily design interfaces of non-standard sizes/proportions and be sure about the scale you're working with. Your layouts will always be in the actual/original size. Managers can present project results to clients without irritating zooming.

manifest.name: Fixiq — Fix the scale of working area

119907.release_notes:
2.0 – Feel FREE!

Fixiq now is absolutely free and open-source.
119907.tagline: Figma plugin that fixes the scale of working area

plugins.name: Juxync
plugins.description:
Want to get alpha access to Jux? Visit jux.io


Jux is a code-based canvas design tool that plugs right into developer's codebase, enabling product designers to design the UI itself and developers its logic.

Creating a good color tokens system is a complex task. Use Juxync to import your variables to Jux to use as design tokens. Juxync will convert your variables collections, groups and modes into token sets to use in Jux. It will maintain all the relationships between variables.


How does Juxync work?

For more visual ‘how does it work‘, visit the knowledge base

  1. It scans Figma color variables in your chosen file.
  2. The plugin auto maps the tokens into core, and other semantics sets.
  3. Sync the tokens into the Jux token management, allowing developers to view and use these tokens via our CLI.


Next up: (or Future features)

  1. Sync Assets (SVG)
  2. Dimensions tokens
  3. Typography styles
  4. Check out the roadmap for more information


Want to be among the first to join the alpha? Join our community

accepted.name: Jux
accepted.description: We’re building a code-based design tool so designers can design the actual, real product as it will be used in production.

plugins.tagline: Juxync imports your Figma Variables as design tokens to Jux, seamlessly.

Choose from a variety of color themes, customize the size, and decide whether to display seconds—all with a simple, intuitive interface. Whether you want a bold accent or a subtle timekeeper, Flip Clock adapts to your workflow. Stay inspired, stay on time, and make your workspace uniquely yours with Flip Clock.

plugins.name: Pixel Painter for Figma
plugins.description:
✨ What is Pixel Painter?

Bored in Figma? Need a quick brain break between design reviews? Pixel Painter lets you unleash your inner 8-bit artist right inside Figma — one pixel at a time. Think pixel art meets coffee break.


🎮 How It Works

  1. Fire up the plugin, get a random fun drawing challenge (like “Draw a cat in 1 minute” 😺).
  2. Use the color palette to fill a pixel grid — no judgment on your MS Paint skills.
  3. Timer keeps the pressure on — can you beat the clock?
  4. Save your masterpiece as PNG (complete with a cheeky watermark).


🧠 Why It Rocks

  1. 100+ non-repeating prompts keep the creativity flowing
  2. Click-to-color grid, color palette, and timer — like Figma meets Mario Paint
  3. Works inside the plugin popup — no canvas mess
  4. Great for solo play
plugins.tagline: Take a break and draw Pixels.

plugins.name: Consistency Checker
plugins.description:
Consistency Checker is your all-in-one solution for ensuring your designs meet WCAG AA standards for text contrast. With a single click, check the accessibility of all text layers in a selected frame, helping you create more inclusive designs effortlessly.


Designing for accessibility shouldn't be an afterthought. Consistency Checker analyzes all text layers within a selected frame, instantly providing contrast ratio information and WCAG AA compliance status.


What This Plugin Does

  1. Evaluates text contrast ratios against backgrounds for all text layers simultaneously
  2. Shows WCAG AA pass/fail status for each text element
  3. Provides detailed contrast ratio measurements
  4. Allows quick navigation to problematic text layers with a single click
  5. Helps you identify accessibility issues early in your design process
  6. Generates comprehensive reports for documentation and team sharing


How It Works

  1. Select any frame containing text layers you want to evaluate
  2. Run Consistency Checker to instantly scan all text elements
  3. View a complete list of text layers with their contrast ratios and WCAG AA compliance status
  4. Click on any text layer in the results to jump directly to it in your design
  5. Make necessary adjustments to improve accessibility
  6. Re-scan to confirm your changes meet accessibility standards


Simplify your accessibility workflow and ensure your designs are inclusive for all users. Install Consistency Checker today!
plugins.tagline: Simplify your accessibility workflow and ensure your designs are inclusive for all users

plugins.name: Import large image(s)
plugins.description:
When posting full page screenshots into FigJam, the images would be blurry and unreadable because Figma automatically reduces image sizes when the height or width is over 4096px. Not anymore!


As a workaround, this plugin

  1. slices the original image into multiple images
  2. groups the sliced images together to create one cohesive image


What makes this plugin different from the others?

  1. The ability to import multiple images at once


If you like it, buy me a beer 🍻
plugins.tagline: Import large image(s) into Figma and Figjam, maintaining resolution and size.

plugins.name: Structura – Effortless Page Organization
plugins.description:
Effortlessly organize and standardize your Figma files with reusable page templates.


Structura helps teams and designers maintain consistency across projects by enabling the creation, saving, and application of structured page layouts. Whether you prefer using built-in presets or custom templates, Structura simplifies your workflow, ensuring every file is clear and organized.



✨ Key Features


  1. Create & Save Custom Templates – Design your own page structures and reuse them effortlessly.
  2. Use Ready-Made Presets – Get started instantly with professionally designed page layouts.
  3. One-Click Template Application – Quickly apply a structure to any Figma file.
  4. Consistent File Organization – Standardize file layouts for better team collaboration.
  5. Easy Editing & Updating – Modify and update templates as your workflow evolves.



🚀 How to Use


  1. Choose a Template – Select from built-in presets or create your own.
  2. Apply to Your File – Instantly structure your Figma pages with one click.
  3. Customize as Needed – Edit sections or save new layouts for future use.
  4. Stay Organized – Ensure every file follows a consistent and streamlined structure.
plugins.tagline: Effortlessly organize and standardize your Figma files with reusable page templates.

plugins.name: Component Boss (Beta)
plugins.description:
Figma Component Boss is a powerful plugin that helps designers efficiently manage components with just a few clicks. Whether you need to convert multiple objects into a master component with linked instances or replace selected objects with an existing component, this plugin streamlines the process—saving time and maintaining consistency in your designs.


How It Works


🔹 Create Component from Selection – Select multiple objects and instantly turn them into a master component with instances, keeping styles, auto-layout, and hierarchy intact.

🔹 Link to Existing Component – Pick a target component and replace selected objects with instances of that component while preserving positions and layout.


Why Use It?


✅ Maintain proper component-instance relationships

✅ Preserve all auto-layout settings, styles, and nested structures

✅ Seamlessly convert objects into reusable instances

✅ Improve workflow efficiency and consistency


Designed for both individual designers and teams, Figma Component Master ensures your design system remains clean, organized, and scalable. Try it now and simplify your component workflow!
plugins.tagline: Supercharge Your Design Workflow

🔹 Link to Existing Component – Pick a target component and replace selected objects with instances of that component while preserving positions and layout.


Why Use It?


✅ Maintain proper component-instance relationships

✅ Seamlessly convert objects into reusable instances

✅ Improve workflow efficiency and consistency


Designed for both individual designers and teams, Figma Component Master ensures your design system remains clean, organized, and scalable. Try it now and simplify your component workflow!

Eliminate the hassle of searching for brand assets with the "Psi Figma Plugin". Instantly access Property Shop Investment LLC’s logos, colors, fonts, and more to streamline your design workflow.

Key Features of the “ Psi Figma Plugin” :


  1. Import Property Shop Investment LLC’s brand assets directly into Figma.


  1. Access the latest logos, icons, colors, fonts, and design essentials with ease.

plugins.name: Structura Swagger Annotator
plugins.description:
Description

Structura revolutionizes how you manage API, design, and copy documentation. With an all-in-one platform, gain clarity on workflows, discover the exact APIs and components used, and ensure precise copies across your designs.


How To?

  1. Run this plugin into your figma files
  2. Paste the whole swagger documentation
  3. Select one of the component and map it by filling the correct path and method
  4. To update the swagger just reupload again the whole json swagger


Feature Request?

Feel free to request more features, for this plugin. Next roadmap for this plugin will be:

  1. Code generation for API request
  2. Hands On API Request on Plugin
  3. Copywriter integration(such as integrating with lokalise)
plugins.tagline: Simplify API and Design documentation by annotating component with swagger API docs.

plugins.name: Swift Layer Exporter
plugins.description:
Manage the layers you want to export based on their name. Just add the file type extension (.jpg, .png, .svg, .pdf) to any layer. With the plugin open select any layer or any parent and all of the tagged layers will automatically be found to export.


You can also set the export scale by adding a percent 200% after the extension. You can also set the layer cropping to its native bounding box with the tag = or to the base frame with #.


  1. button.png # 200% - exports the layer button as a png at 200% in the size of the layout base frame.
  2. button.svg = 100% - exports the layer button as a svg at 100% in the size of the layer.
plugins.tagline: Manage export layers by name

124254.name: Swift Layer Exporter
124254.description:
Manage the layers you want to export based on their name. Just add the file type extension (.jpg, .png, .svg, .pdf) to any layer. With the plugin open select any layer or any parent and all of the tagged layers will automatically be found to export.


You can also set the export scale by adding a percent 200% after the extension. You can also set the layer cropping to its native bounding box with the tag = or to the base frame with #.


  1. button.png # 200% - exports the layer button as a png at 200% in the size of the layout base frame.
  2. button.svg = 100% - exports the layer button as a svg at 100% in the size of the layer.

plugins.name: FontFig
plugins.description:
🤔 How it works:


  1. 1. Choose a font. This will be your base font - it can either be a font you want to manipulate or just help you get a good foundation for the different characters
  2. 2. Import the font. Fontfig will generate an artboard for every character and convert every character into an SVG.
  3. 3. Get creative. Manipulate or create totally new characters.
  4. 4. Export your new font (Whoop)


👉 Pointers:


  1. 📄 One Font can be created / edited per page
  2. 💾 Export each font up to 5 times for one price.
  3. 📐 Adjust the width of the artboard to change letter spacing for each character
  4. 💪 Support for more complex fonts coming soon


💬 We need your feedback:


  1. Drop us a comment or message if you see anything you think could be better. We want to continually improve this Plugin so your feedback is super helpful!
plugins.tagline: Create your own fonts in Figma

109391.description:

  2. 2. Import the font. Fontfig will generate an artboard for every character and convert every character into an SVG.
  3. 3. Get creative. Manipulate or create totally new characters.
  4. 4. Export your new font (Whoop)

  1. 📄 One Font can be created / edited per page
  2. 💾 Export each font up to 5 times for one price.
  3. 📐 Adjust the width of the artboard to change letter spacing for each character

109391.tagline: Create your own fonts in Figma

plugins.name: bb-extract
plugins.description: With our Figma plugin, easily export design tokens to JSON format and gain the added advantage of live values! The plugin extends the 'import & export variables' example, streamlining the process by excluding imports and introducing a 'calculatedValue' property with actual color values (e.g., #00F instead of {colors.blue}). Now, you can seamlessly integrate design tokens directly into your codebase, making it a breeze to maintain a consistent design system. Simplify your design workflow and boost collaboration with this powerful plugin today!
plugins.tagline: Enhance your design token workflow with live values! 💫

93017.name: bb-extract
93017.description: With our Figma plugin, easily export design tokens to JSON format and gain the added advantage of live values! The plugin extends the 'import & export variables' example, streamlining the process by excluding imports and introducing a 'calculatedValue' property with actual color values (e.g., #00F instead of {colors.blue}). Now, you can seamlessly integrate design tokens directly into your codebase, making it a breeze to maintain a consistent design system. Simplify your design workflow and boost collaboration with this powerful plugin today!
93017.release_notes: Introduced a recursive check for local variables that reference other local variables, ensuring accurate calculation of values. This update resolves issues in previous versions where the target variable was located within a group inside a collection.
93017.tagline: Enhance your design token workflow with live values! 💫

plugins.name: PrinTriX (Precise CMYK Color Suite)
plugins.description:
PrinTriX is a powerful Figma plugin designed to streamline the creation of print-ready PDFs, ensuring your design exports consistently reflect your brand guidelines.

Whether you're working on marketing materials, packaging, or brand assets, PrinTriX allows designers to confidently transition from digital design to high-quality print. By supporting advanced features like color profile control, frame selection, and DPI adjustments, the plugin gives teams the precision and flexibility needed to meet even the most demanding print standards. With PrinTriX, maintaining visual consistency across all printed media becomes simple, reliable, and efficient—right from within Figma.

  1. Fine-tune colors with color palette feature that maps RGB colors to your desired CMYK color
  2. Select and organize only the frames you need
  3. Control DPI to balance print quality with file size.
  4. Export Designs to CMYK/Grayscale/RGB print-ready PDFs.
plugins.tagline: CMYK, Print, ColorProfile, PDF, Export, DPI, Bleed

plugins.name: Varcator - Figma Variable Usage Finder
plugins.description:
Varcator - Figma Variable Usage Finder For Dev Mode


Varcator is a Figma plugin that helps you find where text variables are being used in your design files. It provides an efficient way to scan and track variable usage across your Figma projects.


🔥 Highly Recommend to select one variable at a time. 🔥


Features


  1. Variable Collection Scanning: Scan all text variables in your Figma file
  2. Selective Scanning: Choose which variables to scan for usage
  3. Usage Tracking: Find where each variable is being used
  4. Interactive UI: Click on usages to navigate to the specific layers
  5. Efficient Processing: Optimized scanning with rate limiting to prevent API throttling
  6. User-Friendly Interface: Clean and intuitive design for easy variable management
plugins.tagline: Figma Variable Usage Finder for Dev Mode

plugins.name: Spelling Checker
plugins.description:
This plugin helps you find English spelling mistakes inside your Figma designs quickly and effortlessly. By default, it checks all the text on the page. If you select a specific frame or text layer, it will only scan those. Smart, simple, and focused on making your designs error-free.


It’s a lightweight tool built to improve content accuracy without interrupting your workflow.


→ Detects spelling mistakes across your design

→ Works on full pages or selected layers

→ Minimal, clean, and easy to use


I love working at the intersection of design and code. If you're building creative tools, design plugins, or storytelling experiences, let’s connect.


Reach out anytime: hey@abdulwahab.design

Or connect on LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/heyabdulwahab/

plugins.tagline: Real-time spelling correction in any text field
